titles: A declaration of the General Convention of Ireland expressing their detestation of the unjust proceedings against the late King, in a pretended high court of justice in England.
author: Ireland. General Convention.
publisher: Imprinted at Dublin by William Bladen,
notes: "I. of May 1660 Ordered that this Declaration be forthwith Printed and Published. Mat. Barry Cl. of the General Convention of Ireland."
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Commonwealth and Protectorate, 1649-1660.
